item.title: Wicked's New Prequel Reveals That Elphaba Is Much Younger Than I Thought
item.description: Elphie: A Wicked Childhood reminds readers how young Elphaba is at the beginning of Wicked, and the prequel book may surprise movie and musical fans.

item.title: 10 DC Movies Where The Villain Is More Interesting Than The Hero
item.description: There have been a few key instances over the years were a DC movie's villain has been more interesting than the hero. Here are some of our favorites.

item.title: Timothée Chalamet Said He Aspires To Be Like Marlon Brando & Daniel Day-Lewis, And Here Are 7 Performances He Can Aspire To
item.description: Timothée Chalamet says that he's in pursuit of greatness like Marlon Brando and Daniel Day-Lewis, and he has plenty of roles to be inspired by.
